sdg-DC_ODA_TOTGGE.def: Net official development assistance (ODA;http://www.oecd.org/dac/dac-glossary.htm#ODA) to all countries on the DAC List of ODA Recipients (http://www.oecd.org/dac/dac-glossary.htm#DAC_List) and net official development assistance to the Least Developed Countries, SIDS and LLDCs (http://unohrlls.org/), as well as African countries. Data are usually expressed in US dollars at the average annual exchange rate, or as a share of provider countries\' gross national income (GNI).
sdg-DC_ODA_TOTGGE.name: Official development assistance (ODA) as a percentage of OECD-DAC donors' GNI on grant equivalent basis, by donor countries (%)
sdg-DC_ODA_TOTGGE.source: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD).
